title: Case Report: A promising neoadjuvant treatment option for individuals with locally advanced HER2-positive breast cancer involves the use of Pyrotinib Maleate in combination with Trastuzumab and Pertuzumab
content:
Publication date: Available online 11 July 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Chi Pan, Lan Ge, Huifeng Zhang, Kai Sang, Jian Zhou, Tongbo Yi, Qingtao Ni
